## GenericMathNode.validate() method

Validates the node state and input type compatibility

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected validate(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Error message if invalid, empty string if valid

## Remarks

Ensures all inputs: - Have determinable types - Have allowed types for their slot - Share a common type (unless explicitly or additionally typed)
